str2: Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A letter, dispatch, epistle, message. From epistello; a written message.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Feminine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.
This; he, she, it.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Feminine Plural
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Hard to understand. From dus- and a derivative of noieo; difficult of perception.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Plural
str2: Who, which, what, that.
Unlearned, ignorant. Ignorant.
And, even, also, namely.
(lit: unpropped), unsteady, unstable, unsettled. Unfixed, i.e. vacillating.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From a derivative of strepho; to wrench, i.e., to torture, but only figuratively, to pervert.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
And, even, also, namely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Left, left behind, the remainder, the rest, the others. Masculine plural of a derivative of leipo; remaining ones.
(a) a writing, (b) a passage of scripture; plur: the scriptures. A document, i.e. Holy Writ.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Pertaining to self, i.e. One's own; by implication, private or separate.
Destruction, ruin, loss, perishing; eternal ruin. From a presumed derivative of apollumi; ruin or loss.
